When an entry-level analyst unlocks information that could prove to be the downfall of the ﬁrm, a roller-coaster ride ensues as decisions both ﬁnancial and moral catapult the lives of all involved into mayhem.(n)

programme.title: The Space Between Us
programme.desc: Shortly after arriving to help colonize Mars, an astronaut dies while giving birth to the first human born on the red planet, unable to reveal who the father is. The child, Gardner Elliot, is an inquisitive, highly intelligent boy who reaches the age of 16 having only met 14 people in his life. While searching for clues about his father, and the home planet he's never known, Gardner begins an online friendship with a street-smart girl named Tulsa. He arrives on Earth, eager to experience all of the wonders he's only read about.(n)

programme.title: Whale Rider
programme.desc: In a small coastal village, the Maori descend from Paikea, the Whale Rider. In every generation, a male heir has succeeded to the chiefly title. When twins are born, and the boy twin dies, the chief is unable to accept his grand-daughter, Pai, as a future leader. Koro, the chief, is convinced that the tribe's misfortunes began at Pai's birth and calls for people to bring their sons to him, sure a new leader will emerge. Pai loves Koro more than anyone in the world, but she must fight him and a thousand years of tradition to fulfill her destiny.(n)

programme.title: A Woman, A Part
programme.desc: Maggie Siff stars as Anna Baskin, an exhausted workaholic actress at a crossroads. She abruptly extricates herself from a successful but mind-numbing TV role, returning to a life she left behind with ex-creative partners Kate (Cara Seymour) and Isaac (John Ortiz). Director Elisabeth Subrin examines the media's portrayal of women, the nature of friendship and the difficulties of reckoning with change.(n)

programme.title: The Peacemaker
programme.desc: When a train carrying atomic warheads mysteriously crashes in the former Soviet Union, brilliant U.S. nuclear specialist Dr. Julia Kelly (Nicole Kidman) discovers the accident is really part of a diabolical plot to cover up the theft of the weapons. Assigned to help her recover the missing bombs, Special Forces Colonel Thomas Devoe (George Clooney), has a brash, take-no-prisoners style that clashes with Kelly's diplomatic approach. Putting aside their personal differences, the two begin a partnership and try to track down the stolen weapons.(n)

programme.title: Madonna: Rebel Heart Tour
programme.desc: Concert special featuring the iconic superstar as she performs in packed arenas around the globe. Featuring new hits and beloved classics that showcase Madonna's signature visual theatrics, exquisite costumes and awe-inspiring choreography. With exclusive behind-the-scenes access that reveal the pop icon and her legion of dancers as they pour blood, sweat and tears into creating an astonishing arena show celebrated by fans around the world.(n)

programme.title: Joan Rivers: A Piece of Work
programme.desc: This insightful, hysterically funny documentary follows comedienne Joan Rivers through a year of her life while looking back on her groundbreaking, barrier-breaking career as one of the first women to make a name for herself in the tough, male-dominated world of show business.(n)

programme.title: Whale Rider
programme.desc: In a small coastal village, the Maori descend from Paikea, the Whale Rider. In every generation, a male heir has succeeded to the chiefly title. When twins are born, and the boy twin dies, the chief is unable to accept his grand-daughter, Pai, as a future leader. Koro, the chief, is convinced that the tribe's misfortunes began at Pai's birth and calls for people to bring their sons to him, sure a new leader will emerge. Pai loves Koro more than anyone in the world, but she must fight him and a thousand years of tradition to fulfill her destiny.(n)

programme.title: Last Weekend
programme.desc: Celia (Patricia Clarkson) is an aging matriarch who wants everyone to gather one last time at her family's gorgeous Lake Tahoe manor and reminisce before she puts it on the market. However, her sons are too preoccupied with their own busy lives and struggling relationships for any nostalgia. The dream of a splendid Labor Day weekend dies quickly in a whirlwind of contention, crisis and family dysfunction. Celia is forced to let go of her fantasy and attend to the harsh reality brought on by a sudden emergency.(n)

programme.title: The Black Swan
programme.desc: Swashbuckling adventure about a roguish buccaneer who contemplates a career change after his old partner takes a job as the governor of Jamaica. Although he considers joining forces with another infamous brigand, the pirate instead falls in love with the daughter of the former governor and promises to change his illegal ways to win her heart. However, when she is kidnapped, her lover must rely on his skilled swordsmanship and his fearlessness in order to rescue her. (cc).

programme.title: Captain Blood
programme.desc: Swashbuckling saga about a 17th-century Irish doctor who's unjustly charged with treason and sent to Jamaica, where he's sold into slavery, but when pirates attack the island, he and fellow prisoners escape, commandeer a Spanish galleon and set sail on the high seas. This Best Picture nominee made Errol Flynn a star, and is one of nine films he made with director Michael Curtiz. (cc).

programme.title: The Locket
programme.desc: Complex psychological melodrama about a schizophrenic and the man she ruins. (cc).

programme.title: Easy Rider
programme.desc: Set in the '60s, pothead hippie bikers trip from L.A. to New Orleans searching for the meaning of life. On the way, they find comfort in a commune and violence in the South. (cc).

programme.title: The American Friend
programme.desc: Director Wim Wenders' fascinating suspense yarn about a dying man persuaded to commit murders. Bruno Ganz, Dennis Hopper, Lisa Kreuzer, Gerard Blain. Derwatt: Nicholas Ray. American: Samuel Fuller. Based on a Patricia Highsmith novel.

programme.title: Mata Hari
programme.desc: Greta Garbo stars in this biopic about the infamous exotic dancer who mixed spying for Germany with romance during World War I. (cc).

programme.title: Mrs. Parkington
programme.desc: A Nevada maid falls in love with and marries an ambitious mine owner, but when he moves them to a palatial estate in New York, they are spurned by Manhattan society. Greer Garson was nominated for Best Actress as the title character, while Agnes Moorehead received a nod as Best Supporting Actress. (cc).

programme.title: The Locket
programme.desc: Complex psychological melodrama about a schizophrenic and the man she ruins. (cc).

programme.title: The Brothers Karamazov
programme.desc: Director-writer Richard Brooks' version of Dostoevsky's 19th-century masterpiece. (cc).

programme.title: My Fair Lady
programme.desc: This Best Picture, a musical reworking of George Bernard Shaw's "Pygmalion," is about a pompous, acid-tongued professor of linguistics (Best Actor Rex Harrison) who tries to refine an ill-mannered, uneducated guttersnipe and pass her off as a princess in six months. The film won a total of eight Oscars. (cc).

programme.title: International Velvet
programme.desc: Sequel to "National Velvet," with Tatum O'Neal as a horse-loving teen who's groomed to represent Great Britain in the Olympics. Christopher Plummer, Nanette Newman, Anthony Hopkins. Scott: Jeffrey Byron. Beth: Sarah Bullen. Curtis: Dinsdale Landen. Directed by Bryan Forbes. (cc).

programme.title: Monkey Business
programme.desc: A chemist attempting to find a rejuvenation formula in his lab is tricked when a concoction accidentally mixed by a test monkey winds up in the water cooler. (cc).

programme.title: What's Up, Doc?
programme.desc: On a trip to San Francisco to compete for a music grant, a young researcher meets a zany college dropout. Their unpredictable and wacky relationship adds to the antics of the film when four identical plaid bags go missing with valuable contents in them. (cc).

programme.title: West Point
programme.desc: An arrogant cadet at a military academy alienates his classmates and the attractive woman who sees good in him.

programme.title: Hiroshima Mon Amour
programme.desc: The acclaimed study of the affair between a French actress and a Japanese architect, a relationship paralleled with life and rebirth, and death and destruction.

programme.title: La Jetee
programme.desc: This 1962 French film explores the relationship between time, reality and images through the experiences of a survivor of a nuclear war, who tries to escape his post-holocaust world through time travel. The film is entirely composed of still photos.

programme.title: La Pointe-Courte
programme.desc: Parallel stories set in a seaside French village are told. In one, a troubled couple work on repairing their fractured marriage; in the other, a fisherman dodges shore-patrol authorities and contemplates marriage with his 16-year-old girlfriend. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: And God Created Woman
programme.desc: A sexually liberated teenager falls in love with one brother, but when he spurns her affections, she marries the other. Soon, however, all the men around her realize they have taken her for granted.

programme.title: The Swan
programme.desc: Grace Kelly, Louis Jourdan and Alec Guinness in the delightful Molnar play about a princess who loves her tutor but must marry a crown prince. Agnes Moorehead, Estelle Winwood. Caesar: Leo G. Carroll. Captain: Robert Coote. Beatrix: Jessie Royce Landis. Father Hyacinth: Brian Aherne. Subtle humor and romance. Charles Vidor directed. (cc).

programme.title: Dinner at Eight
programme.desc: The Kaufman-Ferber Broadway hit makes for a trenchant character study of a cross-section of elegant New York society types invited to a swank dinner party where the menu includes scandal, suicide, adultery, business chicanery and romance. (cc).

programme.title: The Postman Always Rings Twice
programme.desc: A drifter falls for a devastating femme fatale and they murder her much older husband, the roadhouse owner who hired him. When the two are ultimately arrested, a slimy lawyer may be able to help them avoid jail. (cc).

programme.title: I Married a Witch
programme.desc: The spirit of a 17th century sorceress rematerializes in 1942 New England and falls head over heels in love with a young, handsome politician. (cc).

programme.title: Pillow Talk
programme.desc: Rock Hudson-Doris Day romp about a playboy songwriter and a career woman who feud over their shared party line, then meet and fall in love. programme.title: The Prince and the Showgirl
programme.desc: While visiting England for the 1911 coronation of King George V, a foreign royal becomes infatuated with a London chorus girl and invites her to a "late supper" at the embassy, where she rebuffs his advances, but falls asleep in his suite. programme.title: Up in the Air
programme.desc: Ryan Bingham works for a company that specializes in firing people, and he's forced to take a newcomer named Natalie along on a business trip in order to show her firsthand what he does. programme.title: Roger & Me
programme.desc: Seriocomic essay on General Motors plant closings in Flint, Michigan, which left thousands unemployed. The target for satire is GM chairman Roger Smith.(n)

programme.title: Death of a Salesman
programme.desc: An aging door-to-door salesman loses his job and begins to contemplate suicide. He also faces up to some uncomfortable truths about his son. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Room Service

programme.title: Grand Hotel
programme.desc: This Best Picture winner charts 24 hours in the lives of guests at a plush Berlin hostelry, where a down-on-his-luck thief covets a ballerina's pearls, while lusting after the mistress of a businessman whose dying bookkeeper is tended by a drunken doctor. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Holiday Inn
programme.desc: A country roadhouse in Connecticut is turned into a nightclub 15 times a year in this stylish and snappy Bing Crosby-Fred Astaire musical that introduced "White Christmas," which won an Oscar for Best Song. The Oscar-nominated soundtrack features a wealth of Irving Berlin tunes including "Easter Parade" and "Happy Holiday." The Holiday Inn hotel chain took its name from the film's title. (cc).(n)

programme.desc: Spies and intrigue at a French resort. James Mason. Duclos: Raymond Lovell. Suzanne: Lucie Mannheim. Odette: Patricia Medina. Andre: Herbert Lom. Beghin: Julian Mitchell. Mary: Clare Hamilton. Vogel: Martin Miller. Fair suspense. Directed by Lance Comfort. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Quiet American
programme.desc: Superbly acted adaptation of Graham Greene's novel about the complex friendship between a British journalist and an American agent in 1952 Vietnam. Michael Caine (who was nominated for an Oscar), Brendan Fraser. Directed by Phillip Noyce on location. A less faithful film version was made in 1958, starring Michael Redgrave and Audie Murphy. (cc).

programme.title: King Arthur Legend of the Sword
programme.desc: Arthur draws the legendary sword Excalibur from the stone, and must learn to harness its power in order to lead a rebellion against his uncle Vortigern, who murdered Arthur's father and usurped the throne years ago. (cc).

programme.title: Along Came a Spider
programme.desc: Forensics expert Alex Cross investigates the disappearance of a senator's daughter, a student at a prestigious private academy. (cc).

programme.title: Bananas
programme.desc: A neurotic New Yorker follows the woman he loves unrequitedly to a Central American country and becomes embroiled in a revolution, eventually becoming leader of the country. (cc).

programme.title: The Greatest Game Ever Played
programme.desc: Bill Paxton directed this rousing drama about a working-class amateur golfer (Shia LaBeouf) who challenges the sport's reigning champ (Stephen Dillane) in the 1913 U.S. Open. Writer and producer Mark Frost adapted the screenplay from his own best-selling account of the event. (cc).

programme.title: The Wolfman
programme.desc: Nobleman Lawrence Talbot returns to his ancestral home in Victorian-era England to search for his missing brother, only to fall under a terrible curse that causes him to experience an unsettling transformation. Talbot soon discovers that a ravenous beast is on the loose and he must protect the woman he loves from its clutches. (cc).

programme.title: The Grudge
programme.desc: Director Takashi Shimizu's routine remake of his creepy Japanese thriller "Ju-on" stars Sarah Michelle Gellar as an American nurse in Tokyo who encounters a supernatural spirit spreading a deadly curse. (cc).

programme.title: The Broken
programme.desc: A woman is thrust into a world where everything is subtly unfamiliar in this thriller starring Lena Headey. Gina McVey is enjoying dinner with her family and her boyfriend Stefan when a mirror shatters without cause. The next day Gina sees a woman who looks like her own doppelganger. Curious, Gina sneaks into the woman's apartment and sees a photo of herself and her father. Later, Gina notices that Stefan is not the same and begins having horrific nightmares. (cc).

programme.title: Clash of the Titans
programme.desc: In this fantasy adventure based on Greek mythology, a courageous warrior named Perseus vows to defeat Hades in order to prevent the god of the underworld from overthrowing Zeus, thereby turning Earth into a living hell. A man of godly origins, Perseus watched in agony as Hades took his family, but now, with a small band of warriors by his side, he battles mythical creatures while tapping into his god-like abilities to take control of his own fate. (cc).

programme.title: Rush Hour 2
programme.desc: A wisecracking L.A. cop (Chris Tucker) visits his friend the inspector (Jackie Chan) in Hong Kong, and is drawn into a case involving a mob bigwig and a counterfeiting ring. Chan's stunts punch up this predictable crime yarn. A sequel to 1998's “Rush Hour.” Brett Ratner directed. (cc).

programme.title: Date Night
programme.desc: Mild-mannered married couple Phil and Claire steal a dinner reservation, which leads to a case of mistaken identity. Turns out the reservation was for a pair of thieves, and now a number of unsavory characters want them dead. If they can survive a wacky and life-threatening night, they may just rediscover the passion missing from their marriage. (cc).

programme.title: October Sky
programme.desc: Before becoming a NASA engineer, Homer Hickam was a curious high-school student from West Virginia. When the Soviet Russia launched the first man-made satellite, Sputnik, in 1957, Homer and his friends began designing their own rockets with dreams of escaping their coal-mining town. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Love and Other Drugs
programme.desc: A free-spirited young woman meets her match in a pharmaceutical salesman, and the couple soon discover that the chemistry between them is more powerful than any drug. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Lions for Lambs
programme.desc: Robert Redford directed and stars in this talky treatise on the U.S. war on terror, intercutting the stories of a liberal professor (Redford), a hawkish U.S. senator (Tom Cruise) and a skeptical journalist (Meryl Streep). Michael Pena, Andrew Garfield, Peter Berg, Kevin Dunn. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Knight and Day
programme.desc: A single woman and a spy race to elude a federal agent and uncover the truth about a clandestine mission gone awry. Meanwhile, a CIA director attempts to discover why the unlikely duo have taken flight. Extended edition. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Taps
programme.desc: Military academy cadets take up arms against developers who are plotting to demolish their school. Though a General tries to quell the rebellion, he too is inspired to stand for the school when the Army is called in to rout the boys. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Guru
programme.desc: An Indian dancer goes to Manhattan to become an actor and finds himself boarding with distant relatives and caught up in a love triangle. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Corky Romano
programme.desc: A bumbling veterinarian joins the FBI so he can destroy evidence against his mob-boss father. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Jupiter Ascending
programme.desc: In this sci-fi epic in which human beings are the least-evolved species in the known universe, an ex-soldier protects a seemingly ordinary woman who's been targeted for assassination by a ruthless queen. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Percy Jackson & the Olympians The Lightning Thief
programme.desc: Accident-prone teenager Percy discovers he's actually a demigod, the son of Poseidon, and he must master his newfound skills and find Zeus' stolen lightning in order to prevent a war between the Greek gods that could devastate the entire world. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Green Zone
programme.desc: Chief Warrant Officer Roy Miller deals with booby traps and cover-ups while searching for WMD in Iraq during the U.S. occupation in 2003. When Miller realizes that operatives on both sides of the conflict are attempting to spin the story in their favor, he searches for the facts that will either absolve a rogue regime or take the war to the next level. programme.title: Assassin's Creed
programme.desc: In this adaptation of the popular video-game series, a death-row convict relives his ancestor's memories as an assassin in 15th-century Spain. From this out-of-body experience, he gains the training he needs to battle a conspiracy in the present day. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Time Traveler's Wife
programme.desc: Dramatic fantasy about a librarian whose genetic disorder causes him to hurtle through time when under extreme duress. Despite this condition, he tries to build a relationship with a young heiress. Based on the best-selling novel by author Audrey Niffenegger. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Courage Under Fire

programme.title: Hellbound Hellraiser II

programme.desc: Director Takashi Shimizu's routine remake of his creepy Japanese thriller "Ju-on" stars Sarah Michelle Gellar as an American nurse in Tokyo who encounters a supernatural spirit spreading a deadly curse. (cc).

programme.title: Annabelle Creation
programme.desc: A group of orphaned girls are taken in by a doll maker and his wife, who are still grieving the death of their daughter. However, they are soon terrorized by a haunted doll that's lurking within the couple's house. (cc).

programme.title: Lions for Lambs
programme.desc: Robert Redford directed and stars in this talky treatise on the U.S. war on terror, intercutting the stories of a liberal professor (Redford), a hawkish U.S. senator (Tom Cruise) and a skeptical journalist (Meryl Streep). Michael Pena, Andrew Garfield, Peter Berg, Kevin Dunn. (cc).

programme.title: Collateral Beauty
programme.desc: A New York adman deals with the pain of losing a child by writing letters to Time, Death and Love. He is soon visited by representations of the three concepts, and they, along with his close friends, help him return to some semblance of a normal life. (cc).

programme.title: The Diary of Anne Frank
programme.desc: The tragic plight of two Jewish families hiding from the Nazis in an Amsterdam attic. Joseph Schildkraut, Millie Perkins, Ed Wynn, Shelley Winters (Best Supporting Actress Oscar winner), Lou Jacobi, Richard Beymer, Gusti Huber, Diane Baker. (cc).

programme.title: Hacksaw Ridge
programme.desc: Biopic about World War II Army medic Desmond Doss, a conscientious objector who refused to take a life or even carry a weapon. Doss was eventually awarded the Medal of Honor for saving the lives of 75 soldiers on the battlefields of Okinawa. (cc).

programme.title: The Royal Tenenbaums
programme.desc: A clan's estranged patriarch loses his home and learns that his ex-wife plans to remarry, so he pretends to be dying to win back his family. Although his ex lets him move back in, his three adult children don't react well to their father's return. (cc).

programme.title: 500 Days of Summer
programme.desc: Greeting-card copywriter Tom falls head over heels for his coworker Summer in this romantic comedy. Tom thinks that he's finally found his soul mate, but Summer claims not to believe in true love and is only interested in having some fun with Tom. The film moves forward and backward through various incidents in Tom and Summer's 500-day love affair. (cc).

programme.title: I Love You, Beth Cooper
programme.desc: A geeky high-school student (Paul Rust) dedicates his valedictory speech to Beth Cooper (Hayden Panettiere), the most-popular girl in school. He gets quite a shock when Beth makes a surprise visit to his house and shows him what a night with his dream date would be like. (cc).

programme.title: Big Trouble
programme.desc: The lives of a kooky collection of Miami residents interconnect in this adaptation of humorist Dave Barry's novel. A high-school boy accidentally crosses paths with two hitmen hunting a crooked businessman. Chaos ensues as the boy, the hitmen, two confused cops, two petty robbers, and the Russian mob all get tangled up with one another. (cc).

programme.title: Girl with a Pearl Earring
programme.desc: During the 1660s, a teenage maid (Scarlett Johansson) in the Netherlands becomes a model for painter Johannes Vermeer (Colin Firth). Absorbing and visually rich; the film nicely captures Vermeer's artistic process. Tom Wilkinson. The film scored three Oscar nominations, including Best Cinematography. Peter Webber's directorial debut. Based on the novel by Tracy Chevalier. (cc).

programme.title: Self/less
programme.desc: A dying New York real-estate tycoon undergoes a top-secret procedure to transfer his consciousness into the body of a healthy young man, but he discovers that his new life isn't what he expected after severing ties to his old one and learning about the mysterious origins of his new body. (cc).

programme.title: Once upon a Time in Mexico
programme.desc: A corrupt CIA agent teams up with a guitar-playing gunslinger to stop a coup South of the Border. (cc).

programme.title: West Side Story
programme.desc: Rival New York street gangs war in Manhattan over turf boundaries while two youths fall in love, but they are from opposing groups. (cc).

programme.title: The Time Traveler's Wife
programme.desc: Dramatic fantasy about a librarian whose genetic disorder causes him to hurtle through time when under extreme duress. Despite this condition, he tries to build a relationship with a young heiress. Based on the best-selling novel by author Audrey Niffenegger. (cc).

programme.title: Fast and Furious
programme.desc: When fugitive ex-con Dom Toretto returns to Los Angeles seeking the truth behind a high-profile crime, Agent Brian O'Conner reluctantly seeks out his help in order to take down a common enemy. Speeding from the streets of L.A. into the Mexican desert in convoy heists and precision tunnel crawls, Dom and Brian attempt to get their man while exploring thrilling new frontiers in the fine art of racing. (cc).

programme.title: Percy Jackson & the Olympians The Lightning Thief
programme.desc: Accident-prone teenager Percy discovers he's actually a demigod, the son of Poseidon, and he must master his newfound skills and find Zeus' stolen lightning in order to prevent a war between the Greek gods that could devastate the entire world. (cc).

programme.title: Weekend at Bernie's
programme.desc: A boss invites two underlings to his beach house with the intention of having them killed because they uncovered his illegal activities. However, when they arrive and discover the boss himself is dead, the pair spends the weekend pretending he's alive so that they can enjoy the place and figure out how to get themselves out of harm's way. (cc).

programme.title: Big Fish
programme.desc: A chronicle of the life of Edward Bloom, a garrulous Southerner whose tall tales have always alienated his no-nonsense son, Will. But with Edward near death, Will must come to terms with his father and his stories before it's too late. (cc).

programme.title: Never Been Kissed
programme.desc: Drew Barrymore enchants as a Chicago newspaper editor who relives her hellish teen years while on an undercover assignment at a local high school. Barrymore's great, but the film celebrates the fact that her character wins over the same type of “in crowd” that taunted her as a teen. David Arquette costars as her cool brother. Raja Gosnell is the director, and Barrymore served as executive producer. (cc).

programme.title: In the Land of Women
programme.desc: A jilted L.A. screenwriter visits his sick grandmother in Michigan and gets involved with an attractive neighbor and her daughter. (cc).

programme.title: Invictus
programme.desc: President Nelson Mandela inspires the South African rugby team to strive for the World Cup in hopes of soothing the country's racial tensions. As rugby captain Francois Pienaar leads his team on a winning streak, the people of South Africa are brought together by their collective desire for a major sports victory. (cc).

programme.title: The Quiet American
programme.desc: Superbly acted adaptation of Graham Greene's novel about the complex friendship between a British journalist and an American agent in 1952 Vietnam. Michael Caine (who was nominated for an Oscar), Brendan Fraser. Directed by Phillip Noyce on location. A less faithful film version was made in 1958, starring Michael Redgrave and Audie Murphy. (cc).

programme.title: The Hours
programme.desc: Three women, separated by 80 years, struggle with similar crises linked by the novel Mrs. Dalloway. Author Virginia Woolf attempts to start writing that novel, a '50s housewife contemplates leaving her life behind and a modern-day book editor cares for a former boyfriend who's fighting AIDS. (cc).

programme.title: A Time to Kill
programme.desc: Absorbing adaptation of John Grisham's first novel, about a white lawyer defending a black man who's on trial for killing his daughter's rapists in a racially divided Mississippi town. (cc).

programme.title: Fifty Shades Darker
programme.desc: In this sequel to "Fifty Shades of Grey," the demure Anastasia Steele and possessive businessman Christian Grey pursue a more open and trusting relationship. However, their attempts are threatened by several of his past lovers. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Jupiter Ascending
programme.desc: In this sci-fi epic in which human beings are the least-evolved species in the known universe, an ex-soldier protects a seemingly ordinary woman who's been targeted for assassination by a ruthless queen. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Courage Under Fire
programme.desc: “Rashomon”-like flashbacks lend depth to this military drama, which centers on a scrupulous Army officer (Denzel Washington) probing the Gulf War death of a chopper pilot (Meg Ryan). Monfriez: Lou Diamond Phillips. Hershberg: Michael Moriarty. Ilario: Matt Damon. Bruno: Bronson Pinchot. Edward Zwick directed. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Proof
programme.desc: Gwyneth Paltrow and Hope Davis are superb as the daughters of a mentally unstable math genius (Anthony Hopkins) in this intelligent adaptation of David Auburn's Pulitzer Prize-winning play. Jake Gyllenhaal. Directed by John Madden (“Shakespeare in Love”). (cc).(n)

programme.title: Green Zone
programme.desc: Chief Warrant Officer Roy Miller deals with booby traps and cover-ups while searching for WMD in Iraq during the U.S. occupation in 2003. When Miller realizes that operatives on both sides of the conflict are attempting to spin the story in their favor, he searches for the facts that will either absolve a rogue regime or take the war to the next level. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Alamo
programme.desc: Billy Bob Thornton stars as Davy Crockett and Dennis Quaid is Sam Houston in this somber re-creation of the famous 1836 siege in San Antonio. Historically accurate, but unexciting. Jason Patric, Patrick Wilson. Directed by John Lee Hancock (“The Rookie”). (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Pelican Brief
programme.desc: A law student is forced to go on the run after she uncovers an assassination plot based on a trail of murdered judges, a revelation which puts her own life in jeopardy. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Cop Car
programme.desc: Two rebellious young boys steal a police cruiser and go for a joyride. But when they find a dead body in the trunk, they realize they must evade the car's owner, a corrupt small-town sheriff who's desperate to reclaim his property. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Rookie
programme.desc: Fact-based tale about Jim Morris, a high-school teacher and coach who makes it to the Major Leagues as a 35-year-old relief pitcher. A pitching phenom in his youth, Morris is convinced by the kids on his team to give the big leagues one more shot. Soon he gets a second chance to live his dreams at an age when most ballplayers are pondering retirement. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Girl Next Door
programme.desc: A studious high-school senior falls for his new neighbor, only to discover the blonde bombshell is a former porn star. Matthew finds himself a bit less focused on his studies when Danielle enters the picture and he attempts to convince her to leave the porn business behind. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Dave
programme.desc: An employment-agency owner is enlisted to impersonate the President to avoid a scandal when an extramarital dalliance leads to a mishap that puts the commander in chief in a coma. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Knight and Day
programme.desc: A single woman and a spy race to elude a federal agent and uncover the truth about a clandestine mission gone awry. Meanwhile, a CIA director attempts to discover why the unlikely duo have taken flight. Extended edition. (cc).(n)

programme.title: 27 Dresses *
programme.desc: A woman is always a bridesmaid in this comedy about nuptial obsession and sibling rivalry. Jane loves planning weddings, but her flighty sister's ceremony is the ultimate challenge--she's marrying the man Jane secretly loves. A cynical marriage columnist surreptitiously writing a human-interest story about the girl with a closet full of bridesmaid dresses further complicates Jane's life. (cc).

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Ghost and everything precious to him becomes threatened once he considers giving up his criminal underworld for a legitimate life. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Vida
programme.desc: Still would up from her encounter with Cruz, Emma struggles to find relief. Luckily, Lyn shows up for her when she needs it most. Mari refuses to be a victim and confronts Tlaloc. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: America to Me
programme.sub-title: What's the Big Deal About Oak Park?
programme.desc: The school year begins at OPRF for Grant, Tiara, Charles, Terrence and Ke'Shawn. Controversy over a Black Lives Matter assembly still reverberates as the school confronts years of racial inequities. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Juno *
programme.desc: A sassy teen who becomes pregnant after her first sexual encounter and decides to give up her baby to a well-off couple. (cc).

A cynical marriage columnist surreptitiously writing a human-interest story about the girl with a closet full of bridesmaid dresses further complicates Jane's life. (cc).

programme.title: Antwone Fisher
programme.desc: A true story of a volatile young Navy sailor. Appointed to a Naval psychiatrist, Antwone Fisher is forced to reveal the truth behind his anger and seek out his family in order to come to grips with his past and forge a new road for himself.

programme.title: Spider-Man Homecoming
programme.desc: Spider-Man learns the ropes of being a superhero under the tutelage of Tony Stark, all while juggling his responsibilities as high schooler Peter Parker. Eager to prove himself to Stark, Parker soon gets tangled up with a villain known as the Vulture. (cc).

programme.desc: When a gay artist is assaulted and hospitalized, his cranky OCD neighbor is forced to care for his dog, triggering a change in his selfish attitude, and leading him to set up medical care for the son of his favorite waitress.(n)

programme.title: Clockers

programme.desc: Philip challenges Will and Carlton on his own turf---the courtroom---when the guys refuse to pay the rent. Judge Reynolds: Armelia McQueen. Will: Will Smith. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: An outrageous psychic (Glenn Shadix) arranges a séance for Hilary to communicate with the dead and get over Trevor once and for all. Hilary: Karyn Parsons. Jazz: Jeffrey A. Townes. Will: Will Smith. Carlton: Alfonso Ribeiro. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: Will proves to be just what a black fraternity wants, but Carlton strikes them as a "prep-school...sellout." Top Dog: Glenn Plummer. Orlando: Mushond Lee. Carlton: Alfonso Ribeiro. Will: Will Smith. Philip: James Avery. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: Will breaks a date with Jackie to accompany Hilary to a Playboy reception for "weather girls." Hugh Hefner appears. Hilary: Karyn Parsons. Philip: James Avery. Will: Will Smith. Vivian: Daphne Maxwell Reid. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.sub-title: Home Is Where the Heart Attack Is
programme.desc: Philip (James Avery) has a heart attack after Will sneaks him high-fat foods. Dr. Kevarkian: Dominic Hoffman. Paramedic: Darryl Sivad. Will: Will Smith. Carlton: Alfonso Ribeiro. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: Will's scheme to improve his grades by fixing up his professor (Phil Morris) with Hilary backfires when Hilary finds fault with the man. Hilary: Karyn Parsons. Rhetta: Rachel True. Jackie: Tyra. Will: Will Smith. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Teen Mom: Young and Pregnant
programme.desc: In the premiere, Kayla finds out news about Stephen; cheerleader Lexi has to face the crowd with her pregnant belly; and Ashley and Bar get heated when Bar insists his mom attend their baby shower. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Teen Mom: Young and Pregnant
programme.desc: Ashley and Bar's baby shower goes from zero to 100; Brianna is caught in the middle of her mom and Danae; and Kayla grows concerned that she may end up a single mom. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Teen Mom: Young and Pregnant
programme.sub-title: It's a Baby, Not a Toy
programme.desc: Ashley and Bar deal with baby shower aftermath; Kayla is conflicted about her feelings toward Stephan; and tension continues to rise between Brianna and Danae as they prepare for Braeson's birth. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Teen Mom: Young and Pregnant
programme.desc: Lexi's parents are growing concerned that she and Kyler don't have a plan for the baby's arrival; Brianna and Danae escape tensions at home with a visit to Chicago; Jade's water breaks. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Teen Mom: Young and Pregnant
programme.desc: Jade struggles to care for Kloie by herself; Ashley and Bar take their last trip with friends before becoming parents; Brianna and Danae get ready to welcome baby Braeson into the world. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: MTV's Pretty Little Mamas
programme.desc: In the series premiere, Nicole and her mom friends run into their ex-bestie, Chandlar. Chandlar, is conflicted about what to do about her erratic boyfriend Aaron. Nicole throws a summer kick-off party and is excited to introduce her friends to Michael. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Jersey Shore Family Vacation
programme.desc: Blow ups are served with a side of smack downs at the final family dinner when things turn ugly between Ronnie and The Situation. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Jersey Shore Family Vacation

programme.title: Jersey Shore Family Vacation

programme.title: Słoiki
programme.desc: Prawdzie historie ludzi, którzy przyjechali do Warszawy, by odmienić swoje życie. Mieszkańcy niewielkich miast i wsi liczą, że w stolicy uda im się zrealizować marzenia o lepszej pracy i pieniądzach. Nie łatwo jest im jednak odnaleźć się w wielkomiejskiej rzeczywistości.

programme.title: Eska On The Beach
programme.desc: Wakacyjny program Eski TV nadawany prosto z najpiękniejszych plaż. Ola Kot zaprezentuje widzom wiele ciekawostek, a wśród nich najnowsze plotki, porady modowe oraz wieści muzyczne z kraju i ze świata. Nie zabraknie najnowszych piosenek i teledysków. Widzowie przekonają się, który utwór zasłuży sobie na miano hitu lata.

programme.title: Projekt Kamper
programme.desc: Filip Rudanacja zamienia swojego garbusa na atrakcyjnego kampera i wyrusza na wakacyjną wyprawę. Prowadzący oddaje się paradzie letnich wyzwań. Wypoczywa, szuka dobrej zabawy przy dźwiękach najlepszej muzyki i robi rzeczy, które każdy powinien wykonać podczas urlopu, jak zjedzenie gofra, czy rozstawienie parawanu.

programme.title: Eska On The Beach
programme.desc: Wakacyjny program Eski TV nadawany prosto z najpiękniejszych plaż. Ola Kot zaprezentuje widzom wiele ciekawostek, a wśród nich najnowsze plotki, porady modowe oraz wieści muzyczne z kraju i ze świata. Nie zabraknie najnowszych piosenek i teledysków. Widzowie przekonają się, który utwór zasłuży sobie na miano hitu lata.

programme.title: Projekt Kamper
programme.desc: Filip Rudanacja zamienia swojego garbusa na atrakcyjnego kampera i wyrusza na wakacyjną wyprawę. Prowadzący oddaje się paradzie letnich wyzwań. Wypoczywa, szuka dobrej zabawy przy dźwiękach najlepszej muzyki i robi rzeczy, które każdy powinien wykonać podczas urlopu, jak zjedzenie gofra, czy rozstawienie parawanu.

programme.title: Friends

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The gang disturbs Mr. Heckles (Larry Hankin) for the last time; Phoebe takes issue with Ross on the subject of evolution. Janice: Maggie Wheeler. Treeger: Michael G. Hagerty. Alison: Carolyn Lowery. Chandler: Matthew Perry. (repeat).

programme.title: Mom
programme.sub-title: Wind Chimes and a Bottomless Pit of Sadness

programme.title: George Lopez
programme.desc: After staying a few days with Ernie---and his parents---to escape his own mother, George encourages Ernie to get his own place. Ernie: Valente Rodriguez. Angie: Constance Marie. Benny: Belita Moreno. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Power Rangers Super Ninja Steel

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob longs to meet a new hero he idolizes: Kenny the Cat; Mr. Krabs wants Squidward to work harder, so he tells him about a crab that eats lazy employees. (repeat).

programme.title: The Loud House

programme.sub-title: Patching Things Up; Cheater by the Dozen

programme.title: King of the Hill
programme.desc: Sharp cartoon comedy chronicling the trials of proud Texas propane salesman Hank Hill, his family and their ragtag neighbors. From Mike Judge, the mind behind MTV's 'Beavis and Butt-head,' this one has heart where the other had guts, and fit nicely on Fox's Sunday-night lineup with 'The Simpsons' when it debuted in midseason in 1997. Judge's cocreator is `The Simpsons' former executive producer, Greg Daniels. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Bitz & Bob
programme.desc: There is an amazing seahorse merry-go-round on the beach, and everyone is having lots of fun going round and round - except Bevel. When he runs away from the ride, Bob finds him, only for Bevel to admit he's nervous about going in circles. Everyone joins in to help him overcome his fear and soon he's sitting on his seahorse, Blue Yah, excited about his first turn on a merry-go-round. But now the key that winds it up has broken, so Bitz needs to work out how to get it started using wind power.

programme.title: Bitz & Bob: You Can Do It Too

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: When Grandmaster Glitch makes popcorn in Mount Etna, Italy, he blocks the volcano and endangers farms on its slopes.
